name: Sheep Shape Shift
description:
Welcome To Sheep Shape Shift.

The Magical lands of Woolopia have fallen on dark times. The Evil Shape Shifter Shamus has landed and has been shape shifting sheep, surely there must be something a heroic person like you can do!? Well, I am glad you asked.

It so happens Woolopia grows magic crystal gems which sheep use for medicinal purposes. Set these gems out and give them time to grow and sprout new gems. These gems can cure shape shifted sheep and if you collect 100 of them you might even be able to defeat Shamus.
